---
name: Custom issue template
about: Report a documentation issue or suggest documentation improvements
title: ''
labels: documentation, good first issue, help wanted
assignees: Kamil1230xd

---

**What documentation needs improvement?**
Clearly describe the documentation issue (e.g., unclear section, missing content, outdated information).

**Where is this documentation located?**
Provide the link or location of the documentation page/section.

**Suggested improvement (if applicable)**
Describe what should be added, changed, or clarified.

**Additional context**
Add any other relevant information (screenshots, examples, etc.).
